Brightwing.name: Arcane Flare
Brightwing.description: Shoot a flare dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit, and an additional 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the center. If a Hero is hit by the center, Soothing Mist's passive healing instantly activates.

Brightwing.name: Polymorph
Brightwing.description: Polymorph a target for 1.5 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 25% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

Brightwing.name: Pixie Dust
Brightwing.description: Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 25 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 25%.

Brightwing.name: Blink Heal
Brightwing.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

Brightwing.name: Emerald Wind
Brightwing.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

Brightwing.name: Soothing Mist
Brightwing.description: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.  Passive: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds

Brightwing.name: Phase Shift
Brightwing.description: After 2 seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for 20% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Greater Polymorph
1.description: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%. Hero Takedowns refresh the cooldown of Polymorph.

1.name: Hyper Shift
1.description: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 2 seconds.

1.name: Pixie Charm
1.description: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

4.name: Dream Shot
4.description: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

4.name: Unstable Anomaly
4.description: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

4.name: Magic Spit
4.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 5 seconds.

7.name: Sticky Flare
7.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

7.name: Peekaboo!
7.description: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 (+4% per level) point Shield and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

7.name: Critical Mist
7.description: If Soothing Mist removes a disabling effect from an ally, heal them for 250 (+4% per level).

10.name: Blink Heal
10.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

10.name: Emerald Wind
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

13.name: Pixie Boost
13.description: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

13.name: Safety Dust
13.description: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for 25% more.

13.name: Pixie Power
13.description: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

16.name: Hush!
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 second and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Critterize
16.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

16.name: Phase Out
16.description: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Invisible Friends
20.description: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 (+4% per level) Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

20.name: Intensive Winds
20.description: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds and increase its Mana cost to 200.

20.name: Faerie Protector
20.description: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.
